RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $5,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THETRUTHISTHETRUTH bumped at the start, was in tight and steadied entering the first turn, vied inside to the second turn, drew off and extended the lead while kept to task. J LOVE was allowed to settle and raced in the back, advanced around the far turn, bid inside and earned place while no match for the winner. JUSTABOUTRIGHT led around the first turn, vied to the second turn, tired and gave way. G KATE bumped at the start, was in tight and taken back from between horses into the first turn, pressed the pace three across, was through early, dropped back and not urged late.

ENTRY.NAME: Thetruthisthetruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, in tight, steadied into 1st turn, drew off 2nd turn

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mike Heitzmann, Roger Heitzmann Jr. & Roger Heitzmann III

ENTRY.NAME: G Kate
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, in tight, taken back into 1st turn, pressed,stopped

ENTRY.NAME: J Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, advanced far turn, bid inside, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Justaboutright
ENTRY.COMMENT: led around 1st turn, vied to 2nd turn, tired, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 6600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOOL'S MIRAGE was crowded at the start, hustled along to vie inside and drew off entering the stretch under urging. SUPER SIZER broke in, vied between horses to the far turn, fell back entering the stretch, went evenly late and finished second best.l. OKLAHOMA MOON settled off the pace, advanced around the turn and finished well inside to earn show. ARCH OF SWORDS was unhurried early and trailed the field and passed a tiring rival in an even effort. STOLEN GHOST was away alertly, vied three across, tired into the turn, stopped and was not urged late.

ENTRY.NAME: Fool's Mirage
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded start,hustled along, vied inside, drew clear into stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Super Sizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, vied between horses, fell back into stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Stolen Ghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly,vied 3across,tired into turn,stopped, not urged late

ENTRY.NAME: Arch of Swords
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, even effort, passed tiring rival

ENTRY.NAME: Oklahoma Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, advanced turn, finished well inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 3 4F Dirt CR: 51. Claiming Purse 7700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Multiple Winners Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LYNN'S FOLLY set a pressured pace, drew off on the turn and widened while kept to task. MRSG'S LIL DREAMER lagged early, swung wide leaving the turn and closed to get up for place while no threat to the winner. HUSHED pressed the pace, fell back on the turn, went evenly late and was all out for show. ELIZA ROSE led early, vied to the turn, dropped back and leveled off. NOODLE SALAD was slow early, swung wide leaving the turn and offered a mild bid only. TUATHA was never far back, raced inside, lacked a rally and was not a threat. MISS TYRO showed speed to the turn and gave way. OUTWORKTHEOKIEGIRL showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Lynn's Folly
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, drew off turn, widened, under urging

ENTRY.NAME: Tuatha
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, raced inside, lacked a rally, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Hushed
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, fell back turn, evenly late, held for show

ENTRY.NAME: Noodle Salad
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung wide leaving turn, mild bid only

ENTRY.NAME: Eliza Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, vied to turn, dropped back, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Outworktheokiegirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Mrsg's Lil Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged early, swung wide into stretch, closed, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Tyro
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to turn, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Special Weight Purse 20460. FOR ACCREDITED OKLAHOMA-BREDS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Horses That Started For a Claiming Price of $7,500 Or Less In Their Last Three Starts Least Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONNATHEPRIMADONNA bore out entering the first turn, set a pressured pace to the second turn, inched away and held under pressure. SEXY BROWN was carried out into the first turn, pressed the pace three wide, went willingly to the wire and couldn't gain ground. REALITY CHECK veered in at the start, was checked into the first turn, stalked the pace while saving ground, got through inside on the turn, lacked the needed rally and earned show. SHOOTIN RUN was pushed out and swung wide into the first turn, vied two across to the second turn and gave way. YOUNEEDTOCALMDOWN was last away, steadied entering the backstretch, trailed while racing outside and was not urged late.

ENTRY.NAME: Reality Check
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in start, checked 1st turn, inside trip, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Donnatheprimadonna
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out into 1st turn, set, inched away, held under pressure

ENTRY.NAME: Youneedtocalmdown
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,steadied into backstretch,raced outside, not urged late

ENTRY.NAME: Shootin Run
ENTRY.OWNER: Buehrer Mark W and Kester John
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed out, swung wide 1st turn, vied to 2nd turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Sexy Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out 1st turn, pressed 3w, willingly to wire,couldn't gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 9900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAYRON settled off the pace, rallied three wide between horses on the turn and drew clear under mild encouragement. WRANGLERED set a pressured pace to the second turn, was unable to sustain his bid and finished second best. REVIVAL pressed the pace two across, bid between horses on the turn, leveled off and settled for show. LIARS CLUB was outrun in an even effort. REVEREND AJ broke slowly, advanced towards the outside along the backstretch, bid four across on the turn to loom a threat, swung wide and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Liars Club
ENTRY.COMMENT: even effort, no threat, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Wranglered
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, set pressured pace to 2nd turn, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Reverend Aj
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, advanced outside, bid 4w turn, swung wide, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Revival
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2across, bid between horses turn, leveled off, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Bayron
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, bid 3wide between horses turn, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 6600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OTHER TIMES set the pace, drew off on the second turn for a long lead and was ridden out. SHINE JACK'S DREAM stalked the pace, lacked a late response and was no match for the winner. WHAT ABOUT JIMMY was unhurried early, advanced to the second turn, lacked a bid and was not a threat. J BOB was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Other Times
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off 2nd turn, long lead, riddlen out,

ENTRY.NAME: What About Jimmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, advanced to 2nd turn, lacked a bid,

ENTRY.NAME: J Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Shine Jack's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, lacked late response, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 4950. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 13, 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EURONTHEMONEY vied to the second turn, drew clear and held well. LASTCALLFORALCOHOL bobbled a bit at the start, vied between horses, fell back entering the stretch and finished second best. SMART BATTLE raced close to the pace, saved ground, bid inside leaving the turn, lacked the needed rally under mild urging and held for show. AFLEET SNIPER was never far back, raced outside in a steady effort and didn't have enough late. TOAH pressed the pace to the second turn, fell back and finished evenly. GUNNER PAUL was slow early, swung wide entering the stretch and lacked the needed late response. EVENING STORM showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Evening Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor, outrun, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, saved ground, bid inside, no rally, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Euronthemoney
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied to 2nd turn, drew clear, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: Gunner Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung wide into stretch, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Lastcallforalcohol
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, vied between, fell back into stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet Sniper
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, raced outside, steady effort, not enough late

ENTRY.NAME: Toah
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to 2nd turn, fell back, finished evenly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 21120. FOR ACCREDITED OKLAHOMA-BREDS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CATALE WINEMIXER assumed command on the first turn, drew clear and held well in a driving finish. JUST ROSIE was never far off the pace, saved ground, angled out for the drive, lacked a late rally and finished second best. SPLITSECONDECISION led to the first turn, stalked the pace to the second turn, weakened and held for show. MISSWISH was through after a half. MS. MORENA raced wide, was through early and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Just Rosie
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, saved ground, angled out for drive, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Splitsecondecision
ENTRY.COMMENT: led to 1st turn, stalked to 2nd turn, weakened, held for show

ENTRY.NAME: Misswish
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Catale Winemixer
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command 1st turn, drew clear, held well, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Morena
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced wide, through early, stopped,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Special Weight Purse 17050. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Horses That Started For a Claiming Price of $7,500 Or Less In Their Last Three Starts Least Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPTAIN DOZER broke out, was hustled along to set the pace, swung wide entering the stretch, was under pressure in the drive and held on gamely. LANGMEAD pressed the pace, bid between horses and was carried out entering the stretch, went willingly to the wire and was outfinished. JOE BILL raced close to the pace, bid three across on the turn, was carried out entering the stretch, lost ground and continued to close once straightened. AMMENTHEDESTROYER raced mid pack along the inside and was outrun in an even effort. RYAN EXPRESS was not a factor. OLD TOBY raced wide, was through early and gave way. TEQUILAN ME SMALLS showed little. The rider of LANGMEAD claimed foul against the rider of CAPTAIN DOZER for alleged interference leaving the far turn. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Ryan Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Ammenthedestroyer
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, even effort, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Tequilan Me Smalls
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun, showed little, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Dozer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, hustled along, swung wide into stretch, held on gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Langmead
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bid between, carried out into stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Joe Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, bid 3across turn, carried out into stretch, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Old Toby
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced wide, through early, gave way,
